query:
UPDATE songs SET
                display_id = $1,
                title = $2,
                subtitle = $3,
                description = $4,
                artist = $5,
                file_url = $6,
                cover_art_url = $7,
                lyrics = $8,
                duration_seconds = $9,
                uploader_uid = $10,
                creation_type = $11,
                play_count = $12,
                like_count = $13,
                is_private = $14,
                release_time = $15,
                create_time = $16,
                update_time = $17
            WHERE id = $18
